Articles.Content: On EVA, my Kerbal used to orient based on my camera position while using RCS. Now, they are stuck in one position. I’ve tried different camera settings, nothing is working. Please help!

To make it work the other way forever, change the "EVAs Auto-Rotate to Camera" button in your settings.

To make it work the other way temporarily, click the T button to turn on "SAS" for the Kerbal.

To make the Kerbal face away from the camera just this once, hit the spacebar.
